vs-alert/active.description: Determines if the component is visible.

vs-alert/closable.description: Determines if the alert can be closed by the user

vs-alert/color.description: Color of the alert (primary, success, danger, warning, dark, RGB, HEX)

vs-alert/iconPack.description: Determines the icon pack. If not set, icon will default to Material Icons. ex. FA4 uses fa or fas, FA5 uses fas, far, or fal.
